purpose: Facilitates the creation of intelligent agents capable of multimodal interactions and collaboration.
principle: Leverages LangChain and LLMs to enable multimodal agent capabilities and reflective learning.
reusability: Highly modular with support for custom workflows and multimodal interactions, easily integrated via Python libraries.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited functionality and stability issues, primarily designed for experimentation.
name: agentica
description: Agentica: Effortlessly Build Intelligent, Reflective, and Collaborative Multimodal AI Agents! 轻松构建智能、具备反思能力、可协作的多模态AI Agent。
highlight: Effortlessly build intelligent, reflective, and collaborative multimodal AI agents.
